primaryOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-primary-500 text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-300 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-primary-500 hover:border-transparent active:bg-primary-900
secondaryOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-pink-500 text-pink-700 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-pink-400 hover:border-transparent active:bg-pink-900
successOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-green-500 text-green-700 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-green-500 hover:border-transparent active:bg-green-900
dangerOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-red-500 text-red-700 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-red-500 hover:border-transparent active:bg-red-900
warningOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-yellow-500 text-yellow-700 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-yellow-500 hover:border-transparent active:bg-yellow-900
infoOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-blue-500 text-blue-700 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-blue-500 hover:border-transparent active:bg-blue-900
lightOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-blue-500 text-blue-700 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-blue-500 hover:border-transparent active:bg-blue-900
darkOutline: bg-transparent hover:bg-blue-500 text-blue-700 font-semibold hover:text-white border border-blue-500 hover:border-transparent active:bg-blue-900
